name: Asshole Ducks (thatwhichis)
description: A soothing Ludum Dare 28 game about feeding ducks except you hate some of them arbitrarily and if they take more than one food while there are still starving ducks out there you probably hate them too maybe. YOU ONLY GET ONE, DUCKS. Also there’s [Ed. WAS] a scoreboard. Chrome recommended! Mother approved. (NSFW language.) Actually plays pretty decently in Safari on an iPhone 5S (but not on my desktop? loool), so take it with you to the terlet and play while you poop! Or don’t. Or do, but please don’t tell us about it. (Or DO. o_O) (Don’t.)
